segments.text: I was wondering whether you could ship the tennis racket overseas to Taiwan .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm sorry we don't ship overseas . It's too much trouble .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I understand you don't have a history of shipping overseas , but I am willing to pay extra for shipping .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Maybe we could make an exception for you if you win the bid .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thanks so much ! By the way , is the racket really Serena Williams â€™ ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . You'll get a picture of Serena playing with the racket and a document from her .
segments.speaker: S2
